name: CallOfDooDooAdvancedPooPoo(online)
description: This online fast-paced game is currently in development, though will receive updates every 2 days. Callofdoodooadvancedpoopoo is a fast-paced 2D game with Multiplayer features, in-game chat, and more. To win, try to bounce the other player(s) into the toilet to win. Make sure not to get yourself bounced into the cloud though, because you will never escape. (Make sure to set the join/create game input to "1", doing so will allow to server to run the game more smoothly)
